originalText.text:
Super happy i hired Sam the Handyman to install an AC window unit in my  apartment, and I couldn't be happier with the excellent service I received.Sam is a true professional who arrived promptly, equipped with all the necessary tools, and worked diligently to complete the installation efficiently. His attention to detail and expertise were evident throughout the entire process.Not only did Sam ensure that the AC unit was securely installed, but he also took the time to explain the functions and maintenance tips, ensuring I was comfortable with operating it. His friendly and courteous nature made the entire experience even more pleasant.From start to finish, Sam exhibited exceptional professionalism, demonstrating his deep knowledge and expertise in AC installations. He completed the job with precision and left my apartment clean and tidy, without any traces of the installation process.
Thank you, Sam, for your outstanding work! I will definitely be reaching out for any future handyman needs.

originalText.text: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ Sam  is the go-to expert for window frame repairs and painting in Manhattan! He efficiently repaired and painted my water-damaged window frame, leaving it looking brand new. Highly recommended for excellent results and top-notch service!

originalText.text: We had a fantastic experience with the Handyman for our AC window installation. They were responsive, organized, and took great care to ensure a perfect installation. Our new AC unit is operating flawlessly, and we couldn't be happier. Highly recommend their services!

text.text: We had a fantastic experience with the Handyman for our AC window installation. They were responsive, organized, and took great care to ensure a perfect installation. Our new AC unit is operating flawlessly, and we couldn't be happier. Highly recommend their services!

originalText.text:
Brandon is simply excellent! He installed my air conditioner professionally and promptly, going above and beyond to ensure that I was completely satisfied with the final result.
Throughout the process, his friendly demeanor and exceptional skills were evident, making him a true pleasure to work with. I have complete trust in Brandon's reliability and expertise, and I would recommend him to anyone looking for a trustworthy and skilled handyman. Thank you, Brandon, for providing such outstanding service - you're a true professional!
